bit_depth.docs:
**, int**: The bit depth to use for all output channels in this chain. Must be one of 8, 12, 14 or 16. Defaults to 16.

*See also: [my9231 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/my9231.html#configuration-variables)*

clock_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin which DCKI is connected to.

*See also: [my9231 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/my9231.html#configuration-variables)*

data_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin which DI is connected to.

*See also: [my9231 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/my9231.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this `my9231` component. Use this if you have multiple MY9231/MY9291 chains connected at the same time.

*See also: [my9231 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/my9231.html#configuration-variables)*

num_channels.docs:
**, int**: Total number of channels of the whole chain. Must be in range from 3 to 1020. Defaults to 6.

*See also: [my9231 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/my9231.html#configuration-variables)*

num_chips.docs:
**, int**: Number of chips in the chain. Must be in range from 1 to 255. Defaults to 2.

*See also: [my9231 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/my9231.html#configuration-variables)*

channel.docs:
**, int**: Chose the channel of the MY9231/MY9291 chain of this output component. Channel 0 is the most close channel.

*See also: [my9231 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/my9231.html#id1)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this output component.

*See also: [my9231 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/my9231.html#id1)*

my9231_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/my9231.html#my9231-component). Use this if you have multiple MY9231/MY9291 chains you want to use at the same time.

*See also: [my9231 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/my9231.html#id1)*
